titleStmt.title: A true and plaine genealogy or pedigree of Antichrist, wherein is cleerely discouered that hee is lineally descend from the diuell

publicationStmt.publisher: For Samuell Rande, dwelling at Holborne Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Who so thou art that dost desire to know,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
